attributes.comment:
Myself, being one of the victims of "Stuck in the background checks", feel the
increase in the fees is UNFAIR and EXORBITANT. Every instance I spoke to
USCIS about my situation, I get an answer as "Its beyond our control of checking
the background information and is done by other organizations". If that is the case,
how would the fee increase by USCIS expedite the background check process?

One of the comment by USCIS in the monthly newsletter says

"Improving the timeliness of background checks by expanding current name check
resolution capacity, establishing co-located name check resolution capacity, and
fully funding the FBI background check process"

I think this is absolutely UNTRUE, is only said to convince people to support this
UNFAIR fee increase.

I ABSOLUTELY DON'T THINK THE FEE INCREASE SHALL AFFECT THE
TIMELINES AND PROCESSING TIMES.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
